description: This file implements the LocalStorageProvider class, which provides filesystem-based storage functionalities including save, open, exists, and delete operations. It uses a base directory for storage and handles path resolution and security concerns like path traversal prevention.

classes.name: LocalStorageProvider
classes.description: A class that provides local filesystem storage operations, handling file saving, opening, existence checking, and deletion within a specified base directory.

methods.name: LocalStorageProvider
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the provider with a base directory path.

methods.name: resolvePath
methods.description: Resolves and normalizes the requested path ensuring it stays within the base directory to prevent path traversal.

methods.name: save
methods.description: Saves input stream data to the specified path within the storage and returns the path as a string.

methods.name: open
methods.description: Opens a stored file as an input stream.

methods.name: exists
methods.description: Checks if a file exists at the specified path.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes the file at the specified path if it exists.
